attributes.action: Investigate donor contracts. Where is the money going? Where is the value?
attributes.additional_details: This has to stop. All contracts bidded for in a transparent manner and audited independently, so donors cannot buy a piece of government.
attributes.background: Inquiry into the services provided by these donors after receiving government contracts, the value for money, what are we paying for. And how much the donor contributed to the party. Why are they making extraordinary amounts of money from these contracts.
